value.title: The Power BI Premium video you need to watch… probably (Oct 2021)
value.excerpt: There has been a lot of recent news about Power BI Premium. Adam looks at what Gen2 is all about along with timelines to keep in mind. A MUST watch... probably.  What is Power BI Premium Gen2: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-gen2-what-is  Power BI Premium Gen2 capacity load

value.title: The Tale of Two Caches
value.excerpt: Want to optimize performance in Power BI? Of course, you do! In order to do that, you need to understand the two caches that are at play and how they affect your optimization efforts. Marco Russo helps explain!  DAX Studio 3 https://daxstudio.org  Connect with SQLBI: Website: https://sqlbi.com YouTube:

value.title: Use a KPI in a table within Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam shows you how you can import KPIs from Excel into Power BI. Once in Power BI, you can use the KPI in a table or matrix.  Import and display KPIs in Power BI https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-import-and-display-kpis  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at what a Power BI tenant is. This is really the Azure Active Directory / Office 365 tenant that contains your users, groups, subscriptions and more. value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?

value.title: Why isn't my Agg hitting when using DISTINCTCOUNT in Power BI???

Get ready for some DAX fusion!  DAX Fusion: https://dax.tips/2019/08/05/dax-fusion/  Aggregations Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/aggregations-advanced

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)

value.excerpt: Datetime related calculations are some of the most common, yet confusing, calculations for people who are new to Power BI.
